name: ToyBox (itch) (Jesús Mastache Caballero, CarlosBarcena)
description:
Moved by an unfathomable need, you come back to your old home and end up finding your childhood toys. Society tells you to reject them, but your heart asks you to give them a second chance. Play various micro games on quick succession and dominate them to meet once again a forgotten facet of yourself.

Made during GGJ 2023

Credits: 

- Programming: Jesús Mastache

- Art: Irma León

- Game design: Carlos Bárcena

Music:

- "Arabesque 1 & 2" by Claude Debussy

- Suite Bergamasque - IV. "Passepied" by Claude Debussy

- "Reverie" by Claude Debussy

- Instrumentalization: Carlos Bárcena

- SFX: Freesound.org, Carlos Bárcena
